title: Update branding to Alexis Granite across the site

requirements.text: Update all user-facing branding text to use the company name "Alexis Granite" (instead of "Granite Works" / generic headings) on the public homepage and global layout, while preserving the prominent "Free Estimates" and "Travel Anywhere" messaging.

quotes: Create a website to collect inquiries about my granite countertop work, my company is called Alexis Granite, please make it noticeable that it is free estimates, and can travel anywhere.

acceptanceCriteria: The site header brand text displays "Alexis Granite".
The site footer brand text displays "Alexis Granite".
The homepage hero section clearly identifies the company as "Alexis Granite" (e.g., in the main headline or immediately adjacent brand text).
Existing value proposition callouts remain prominent and still say "Free Estimates" and "Travel Anywhere".
The browser tab title (HTML document <title>) reflects "Alexis Granite" branding.

constraints: Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui or any frontend immutablePaths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Keep the existing single-actor Motoko backend architecture unchanged.
nonGoals: Change the inquiry form fields, backend inquiry storage, or dashboard access control behavior.
